name: discord-hono
description: Edge Functions module for interacting with the Discord API
author: Luis (https://github.com/LuisFun)

scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm run tag && npm run push
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm run tag && npm run push
scripts.major: npm version major && npm run tag && npm run push
scripts.tag: for /f "tokens=*" %i in ('node -p "require('./package.json').version"') do git tag v%i
